sections.text: Determination of incidental mattersIn a proceeding for divorce or thereafter, either spouse may request a determination of custody, visitation, or support of a minor child; support for a spouse; injunctive relief; use and occupancy of the family home or use of community movables or immovables; or use of personal property.Acts 1984, No. 817, ยง1; Acts 1990, No. 1009, ยง2, eff. Jan. 1, 1991.
